info.title: PhoneNumbersClient
info.description: The phone numbers client uses Azure Communication Services to purchase and manage phone numbers.

tags: Browse for available countries, cities and area codes
get.summary: Gets the list of available area codes.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code, e.g. US.

parameters.name: phoneNumberType
parameters.description: Filter by numberType, e.g. Geographic, TollFree.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes. The default value is 100.

parameters.name: assignmentType
parameters.description: Filter by assignmentType, e.g. Person, Application.

parameters.name: locality
parameters.description: The name of locality or town in which to search for the area code. This is required if the number type is Geographic.

parameters.name: administrativeDivision
parameters.description: The name of the state or province in which to search for the area code.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The locale to display in the localized fields in the response. e.g. 'en-US'

tags: Browse for available countries, cities and area codes
get.summary: Gets the list of supported countries.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes. The default value is 100.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The locale to display in the localized fields in the response. e.g. 'en-US'

tags: Browse, reserve and purchase available phone numbers
post.summary: Searches for available phone numbers to purchase. Note that this does not reserves the numbers in the response.

200.description: A randomized list of phone numbers available to purchase matching the browsing criteria.

tags: Browse for available countries, cities and area codes
get.summary: Gets the list of cities or towns with available phone numbers.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code, e.g. US.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes. The default value is 100.

parameters.name: administrativeDivision
parameters.description: An optional parameter for the name of the state or province in which to search for the area code.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The locale to display in the localized fields in the response. e.g. 'en-US'

tags: Browse for available countries, cities and area codes
get.summary: List available offerings of capabilities with rates for the given country.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code, e.g. US.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxPageSize
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes. The default value is 100.

parameters.name: phoneNumberType
parameters.description: Filter by numberType, e.g. Geographic, TollFree.

parameters.name: assignmentType
parameters.description: Filter by assignmentType, e.g. Person, Application.

parameters.name: accept-language
parameters.description: The locale to display in the localized fields in the response. e.g. 'en-US'

tags: Browse, reserve and purchase available phone numbers

200.description: A collection of Phone Number Reservations, and an optional link to the next page of results.

tags: Browse, reserve and purchase available phone numbers
patch.summary: Creates or updates a reservation by its ID.

tags: Browse, reserve and purchase available phone numbers
get.summary: Gets a reservation by its ID.

tags: Browse, reserve and purchase available phone numbers
delete.summary: Deletes a reservation by its ID. Any phone number in the reservation will be released and made available for others to purchase.

tags: Browse, reserve and purchase available phone numbers
post.summary: Starts the purchase of all phone numbers in the reservation. This is a long running operation.

202.description: The service has accepted the request and will start processing later. It will return 'Accepted' immediately and include an 'Operation-Location' header. Client side should further query the operation status using the URL specified in 'Operation-Location' header.

Operation-Location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

tags: Find and purchase available phone numbers
post.summary: Search for available phone numbers to purchase.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code, e.g. US.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The phone number search request.

202.description: The service has accepted the request and will start processing later. It will return 'Accepted' immediately and include an 'Operation-Location' and 'Location' headers. Client side should further query the operation status using the URL specified in 'Operation-Location' header. When operation completes successfully query final result using URL specified in 'Location' header.

Location.description: URL to retrieve the final result after operation completes.

Operation-Location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

tags: Find and purchase available phone numbers
get.summary: Gets a phone number search result by search id.

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: The search Id.

tags: Find and purchase available phone numbers

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The phone number purchase request

202.description: The service has accepted the request and will start processing later. It will return 'Accepted' immediately and include an 'Operation-Location' header. Client side should further query the operation status using the URL specified in 'Operation-Location' header.

Operation-Location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

tags: Long running operations
get.summary: Gets an operation by its id.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The id of the operation

200.description: When the operation is completed, query the final result of the operation using the URL specified in the 'Location' attribute in the response header.

Location.description: Url to retrieve the final result after operation completes.

tags: Long running operations
delete.summary: Cancels an operation by its id.

parameters.name: operationId
parameters.description: The id of the operation

tags: Manage purchased phone numbers
patch.summary: Updates the capabilities of a phone number.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The phone number id in E.164 format. The leading plus can be either + or encoded as %2B, e.g. +11234567890.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Defines the update capabilities request.

202.description: The service has accepted the request and will start processing later. It will return 'Accepted' immediately and include an 'Operation-Location' and 'Location' headers. Client side should further query the operation status using the URL specified in 'Operation-Location' header. When operation completes successfully query final result using URL specified in 'Location' header.

Location.description: URL to retrieve the final result after operation completes.

Operation-Location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

tags: Manage purchased phone numbers
get.summary: Gets the details of the given purchased phone number.

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: The purchased phone number whose details are to be fetched in E.164 format, e.g. +11234567890.

tags: Manage purchased phone numbers

parameters.name: phoneNumber
parameters.description: Phone number to be released, e.g. +11234567890.

202.description: The service has accepted the request and will start processing later. It will return 'Accepted' immediately and include an 'Operation-Location' header. Client side should further query the operation status using the URL specified in 'Operation-Location' header.

Operation-Location.description: URL to query for status of the operation.

tags: Manage purchased phone numbers
get.summary: Gets the list of all purchased phone numbers.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to skip, for pagination purposes. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes. The default value is 100.

tags: Obtain operator information for requested numbers
post.summary: Searches for number format and operator information for a given list of phone numbers.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The phone number(s) whose number format and operator information should be searched

OfferingsResponse.description: Represents a wrapper around a list of offerings.

phoneNumberOfferings.description: Represents the underlying list of offerings.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page.

OperatorDetails.description: Represents metadata describing the operator of a phone number

mobileNetworkCode.description: Mobile Network Code, 2 or 3 decimal digits that identify mobile networks within a country/region

mobileCountryCode.description: Mobile Country Code, 3 decimal digits that identify a country/region

OperatorInformation.description: Represents metadata about a phone number that is controlled/provided by that phone number's operator.

phoneNumber.description: E.164 formatted string representation of the phone number

nationalFormat.description: National format of the phone number

internationalFormat.description: International format of the phone number

isoCountryCode.description: ISO 3166-1 two character ('alpha-2') code associated with the phone number.

numberType.description: Type of service associated with the phone number

OperatorInformationOptions.description: Represents options to modify a search request for operator information

includeAdditionalOperatorDetails.description: Includes the fields operatorDetails, numberType, and isoCountryCode in the response.  Please note: use of this option will result in additional costs

OperatorInformationRequest.description: Represents a search request for operator information for the given phone numbers.

phoneNumbers.description: Phone number(s) whose operator information is being requested

OperatorInformationResult.description: Represents a search result containing format and operator information associated with the requested phone numbers

values.description:
Results of a search.
This array will have one entry per requested phone number which will contain the relevant operator information.

PhoneNumberAdministrativeDivision.description: Represents an administrative division. e.g. state or province.

localizedName.description: Represents the localized name of the administrative division of the locality. e.g. state or province localized name.

abbreviatedName.description: Represents the abbreviated name of the administrative division of the locality. e.g. state or province abbreviation such as WA (Washington).

PhoneNumberAreaCodes.description: The list of available area codes.

areaCodes.description: Represents a list of available toll-free area codes.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page.

PhoneNumberCost.description: The incurred cost for a single phone number.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code for the cost amount, e.g. USD.

billingFrequency.description: The frequency with which the cost gets billed.

PhoneNumberCountries.description: Represents a wrapper around a list of countries.

countries.description: Represents the underlying list of countries.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page

localizedName.description: Represents the name of the country.

countryCode.description: Represents the abbreviated name of the country.

PhoneNumberLocalities.description: Represents a wrapper around a list of cities or towns.

phoneNumberLocalities.description: Represents the underlying list of localities, e.g. cities or town.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page.

localizedName.description: Represents the localized name of the locality.

PhoneNumberOffering.description: Represents a phone number capability offering

phoneNumberType.description: Represents the number type of the offering.

assignmentType.description: Represents the assignment type of the offering.

operationType.description: The type of operation, e.g. Search

resourceLocation.description: URL for retrieving the result of the operation, if any.

createdDateTime.description: The date that the operation was created.

lastActionDateTime.description: The most recent date that the operation was changed.

PhoneNumberPurchaseRequest.description: The phone number search purchase request.

consentToNotResellNumbers.description: The consent to not resell numbers.

PhoneNumberSearchRequest.description: Represents a phone number search request to find phone numbers. Found phone numbers are temporarily held for a following purchase.

phoneNumberType.description: The type of phone numbers to search for, e.g. geographic, or tollFree.

assignmentType.description: The assignment type of the phone numbers to search for. A phone number can be assigned to a person, or to an application.

areaCode.description: The area code of the desired phone number, e.g. 425.

quantity.description: The quantity of desired phone numbers. The default value is 1.

PhoneNumberSearchResult.description: The result of a phone number search operation.

phoneNumbers.description: The phone numbers that are available. Can be fewer than the desired search quantity.

phoneNumberType.description: The phone number's type, e.g. geographic, or tollFree.

searchExpiresBy.description: The date that this search result expires and phone numbers are no longer on hold. A search result expires in less than 15min, e.g. 2020-11-19T16:31:49.048Z.

isResellConsentRequired.description: Indicates if resell consent is required.

errorCode.description: The error code of the search.

id.description: The id of the phone number, e.g. 11234567890.

phoneNumber.description: String of the E.164 format of the phone number, e.g. +11234567890.

countryCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 code of the phone number's country, e.g. US.

phoneNumberType.description: The phone number's type, e.g. geographic, tollFree.

assignmentType.description: The assignment type of the phone number. A phone number can be assigned to a person, or to an application.

purchaseDate.description: The date and time that the phone number was purchased.

PurchasedPhoneNumbers.description: The list of purchased phone numbers.

phoneNumbers.description: Represents a list of phone numbers.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page of phone number results.

phoneNumberType.description: Represents the number type of the offering.

assignmentType.description: Represents the assignment type of the offering. Also known as the use case.

phoneNumberPrefixes.description: The phone number prefix to match. If specified, the search will be limited to phone numbers that start with the any of the given prefixes.

PhoneNumberBrowseCapabilitiesRequest.description: The minimum desired capabilities for the browse operation request.

phoneNumbers.description: The phone numbers that are available for purchase.

AvailablePhoneNumber.description: Represents a phone number available in inventory

id.description: The id of the phone number.

countryCode.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code, e.g. US.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number in E.164 format, e.g. +11234567890.

phoneNumberType.description: Represents the number type of the offering.

assignmentType.description: Represents the assignment type of the offering. Also known as the use case.

isResellConsentRequired.description: Indicates if resell consent is required.

error.description: If status is error, this will contain the error details.

reservations.description: Represents a list of phone numbers reservations. Note that the phone numbers from each reservation are not included.

nextLink.description: Represents the URL link to the next page of phone number results.

expiresAt.description: The time at which the reservation will expire. If a reservation is not purchased before this time, all of the reserved phone numbers will be released and made available for others to purchase.

phoneNumbers.description: A dictionary containing the reservation phone numbers. The key is the ID of the phone number (digits only) and values are AvailablePhoneNumber objects. Not populated when retrieving PhoneNumbersReservation collections.

status.description: Represents the status of the reservation. Possible values include: 'active', 'submitted', 'completed', 'expired'.

PhoneNumbersReservationPurchaseRequest.description: The phone number search purchase request.

consentToNotResellNumbers.description: The consent to not resell numbers.

CountryCodeParameter.name: countryCode
CountryCodeParameter.description: The ISO 3166-2 country code, e.g. US.

MaxPageSizeParameter.name: maxPageSize
MaxPageSizeParameter.description: An optional parameter for how many entries to return, for pagination purposes. The default value is 100.
